N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 521.7 - Method of payment of state aid grants

State Regulations
(a) Payments shall be made pursuant to an
installment schedule determined by the OMH. Upon completion of the project, an
audit shall be conducted by the OMH. A final payment will be made upon
completion of the audit and its acceptance by the OMH and the State

Comptroller. (b) Certification that
payment of any of the scheduled installments due to an applicant may be subject
to inspection by OMH to determine that the work has been performed upon a
project or that purchases have been made in accordance with the approved plans
and specifications. (c) OMH, in its
sole discretion, may require the State aid grant funds be disbursed to third
parties, held in escrow, or paid to the applicant in some other secured and
protected manner to assure that the proper use is made of such loans. Notes
